Package address.gui

Class MenuGUI

java.lang.Object
address.gui.MenuGUI
public class MenuGUI extends Object
Defines the GUI for the AddressBookApplication.

      evt - The button event.

    • displayEntries

      private void displayEntries()
      Displays a list of all address entries in the AddressBook sorted in alphabetical order by last name, then first name.

    • displayEntries

      private void displayEntries(Collection<AddressEntry> entries)
      Displays a list of address entries sorted in alphabetical order by last name, then first name.
      Parameters:
      entries - A collection of address entries to display.

    • onSelectEntry

      private void onSelectEntry(ListSelectionEvent evt)
      Called when an address entry is selected.
      Parameters:
      evt - The list selection event.

    • onRequestNewEntry

      private void onRequestNewEntry(ActionEvent evt)
      Called when the new button is pressed. Opens the AddressEntry form to create a new AddressEntry.
      Parameters:
      evt - The button event.

    • showAddressEntryForm

      private void showAddressEntryForm(AddressEntry entry, String submitText, String cancelText)
      Displays the AddressEntry form.
      Parameters:
      entry - The AddressEntry used to populate the form fields.
      submitText - The text for the submit button.
      cancelText - The text for the cancel button.

    • onSubmitEntry

      private void onSubmitEntry(ActionEvent evt)
      Called when the submit button is pressed. Changes or creates an AddressEntry.
      Parameters:
      evt - The button event.

    • onCancelEntry

      private void onCancelEntry(ActionEvent evt)
      Called when the cancel button is pressed. Stops creating or editing an AddressEntry and closes the address entry form.
      Parameters:
      evt - The button event.

    • hideAddressEntryForm

      private void hideAddressEntryForm()
      Closes the AddressEntry form.

    • onRemoveSelectedEntry

      private void onRemoveSelectedEntry(ActionEvent evt)
      Called when the remove button is clicked. Removes the selected AddressEntry.
      Parameters:
      evt - the button event.

    • getRoot

      public JPanel getRoot()
      Returns the root panel.
      Returns:
      the root panel.
